prescription_text: Rx: Warfarin 5mg PO daily for atrial fibrillation. Monitor INR weekly initially, then monthly when stable. Target INR 2-3. Patient has history of hypertension, currently on Lisinopril 10mg daily.

Rx: Metformin 500mg PO BID with meals for Type 2 DM. Start with 500mg daily x 1 week, then increase to BID. Monitor HbA1c in 3 months. Patient also prescribed Ibuprofen 400mg TID PRN for arthritis pain.
Rx: Aspirin 81mg PO daily for secondary prevention post-MI. Omeprazole 20mg daily for gastroprotection. Patient has history of GERD and recent myocardial infarction.
Rx: Amoxicillin 500mg PO TID x 10 days for pneumonia. Patient is 8 years old, weight 25kg. No known allergies. Ensure adequate hydration.
